Title: Qualifies the permitted use of proceeds from the lease of lands located at the state university of New York at Purchase
Summary: Qualifies the permitted use of proceeds from the lease of lands located at the state university of New York at Purchase shall go to New York state resident students who were at any time while attending Purchase College eligible to receive a Pell grant.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 405 of the laws of 2011, relating to authorizing the lease of lands located at the state university of New York at Purchase, in relation to the permitted use of proceeds from the lease of such lands
